author: haskellcoding
title: Building Cardano glossary
description: For the mass adoption of the Cardano, technical mass understanding is essential, but is rarely provided in English as well as in local.
solution: This project will build a web dictionary that can explain technical terms related to Cardano in an easy-to-understand manner.
experience: I have translated some of IOHK blog posts into Japanese and Korean, and regularly posts them to the cardano forum and official community.
